DOC.brief_summary: The CRONOS-ADM ( Coronary CT angiography evaluation clinical outcome asymptomatic patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ) registry large , prospective observational registry demographic , clinical laboratory data long-term clinical outcome asymptomatic diabetic patient without history CAD angina angina-equivalent symptom two affiliated hospital The Catholic University Korea .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age > 18 year 2 . Asymptomatic type 2 diabetes mellitus 3 . Prospective data collection CAD risk factor
